entities: United Nations Mission for the Referendum in Western Sahara
summary:
The Security Council,
Reaffirming previous resolutions on Western Sahara, 
Recalling principles on safety of UN personnel,
Welcoming the Secretary-General's report and supporting the Personal Envoy's role,
 Reiterating support for MINURSO's efforts to implement the Settlement Plan,
Noting unresolved differences between parties,
Regretting lack of progress in London talks,
Decides to:
1. Extend MINURSO's mandate until 31 October 2000, expecting direct talks between parties under the Personal Envoy's auspices,
2. Request the Secretary-General to assess the situation before the mandate ends,
3. Remain seized of the matter.
